General_Description: '''Rock and Roll''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found the riddle at the [[Diolkos West Ramp]].
Section_Riddle: ''Back and forth along the [[Diolkos]], talk about repetitive work! Though it's the fastest way to get a [[boat]] across the [[Greece|mainland]], you may feel mocked. Along this path stands the statue of [[Sisyphos]] pushing his boulder up the hill. Find me in the [[Grave of Sisyphos|cave]] behind this statue, I am on a table with a sacrificed body.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
